title: How many Tesla Gigafactories are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tesla currently (as of September 2020) has 5 gigafactories and one automotive plant (tesla factory): Tesla factory: Fremont, California, USA products: Model X / S / Y / 3 status: production Gigafactory 1 (Giga Nevada): Storey County, Nevada, USA products: Drive components (electric machines, batteries, cells, modules) status: production Gigafactory 2 (Giga New York): Buffalo, New York, USA Products: solar roofs, fast charging stations status: production Gigafactory 3 (Giga Shanghai): Shanghai, China Products: Model 3, Model Y (from 01/2021) status: production Gigafactory 4 (Giga Berlin): Berlin, Germany Products: Model Y (from 07/2021) status: under construction Gigafactory 5 (Giga Texas): Austin, Texas, USA products: Model Y / 3, Cybertruck, semi truck (all of them from the end of 2021) status: under construction
There are 3! The first was built in Sparks, Nevada, the other is in Buffalo, NY and the first out of the US is in Shanghai, China and it’s just about ready to go and built in record time!
